[00:00.00]WITHOUT YOU (Explicit) - The Kid LAROI
[00:03.77]Lyrics by：Charlton Howard/Omer Fedi/Billy Walsh/Blake Slatkin
[00:07.55]Composed by：Charlton Howard/Omer Fedi/Billy Walsh/Blake Slatkin
[00:11.33]You cut out a piece of me and now I bleed internally
[00:16.28]Left here without you
[00:18.30]No no no
[00:19.64]Without you
[00:21.07]Ooh ooh
[00:21.82]And it hurts for me to think about what life could possibly be like
[00:27.15]Without you
[00:28.63]No no no
[00:29.83]Without you
[00:31.20]No no
[00:31.79]I can't believe that you would up and leave me
[00:36.52]F**k all of your reasons
[00:38.88]I lost my s**t you know I didn't mean it
[00:42.35]Now I see it you run and repeat it
[00:46.64]And I can't take it back so in the past is where we'll leave it huh
[00:52.44]So there you go oh
[00:54.42]Can't make a wife out of a ho oh
[00:57.07]I'll never find the words to say I'm sorry
[01:00.51]But I'm scared to be alone

[01:36.96]Oh-oh woah-oh oh-oh woah-oh

data.trans:
[ti:WITHOUT YOU (Explicit)]
[ar:The Kid LAROI]
[al:F*CK LOVE (SAVAGE) (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:03.77]//
[00:07.55]//
[00:11.33]你让我心痛不已 如今我的心在淌血
[00:16.28]我独自离开这里 没有你的陪伴
[00:18.30]//
[00:19.64]没有你在身旁
[00:21.07]//
[00:21.82]难以想象没有你的生活 
[00:27.15]没有你的陪伴
[00:28.63]//
[00:29.83]没有你在身旁
[00:31.20]//
[00:31.79]我不敢相信你竟会离我而去
[00:36.52]我不愿听你的措辞
[00:38.88]我只是一时迷失 我并不是故意伤害你
[00:42.35]如今看着你逃离我 重蹈覆辙
[00:46.64]我也难以收回说出的话 所以我们将之留在过去
[00:52.44]你已离去
[00:54.42]不能让你成为我的妻子
[00:57.07]难以对你道歉
[01:00.51]但我害怕孤身一人
[01:03.01]你让我心痛不已 如今我的心在淌血
[01:07.82]我独自离开这里 没有你的陪伴

[01:34.42]//
[01:36.96]//
[01:39.55]没有你在身旁 没有你的陪伴
[01:44.83]自己一个人的生活 将会无比艰难
[01:47.37]目睹着你离去 更是难上加难
[01:50.17]我真希望 我们可以破镜重圆
[01:54.27]所以我说
[01:56.43]不能让你成为我的妻子
[01:59.00]难以对你道歉
[02:02.37]但我害怕孤身一人
